review_data.title: bad service at big ben west side
review_data.content: we were expected to go get our drink by ourselves it was awful. we were so mad and angry at the staff. Luzern is a way better city than zurich

review_data.title: Good beer, Tuesday night AYCE wings

review_data.title: So good
review_data.content: Entrecote was soooo goood! And I loved the Nachos too, even I normally don't like theme 😍 Will stay here again.

review_data.title: Pretty pretty good.

review_data.title: Not for drinkers
review_data.content: Had a few drinks eventually staff were inattentive and slow to deliver even forgetful . If you want a few beers I don’t suggest going here.!!

review_data.title: Guter Burger

review_data.title: Nice staff and nice food.
review_data.content: Food was cooked to perfection. It is priced about right for Zurich with a good selection. Can be a bit busy but is well placed for local business. Staff were helpful and pub was clean. Quick service with a smile.

review_data.title: Nice food
review_data.content: Good bar with quality Burgers and changing specials. They also have a selection of different beers. Was pretty busy on a Wednesday evening so service took a while.

review_data.title: Big Ben - new local
review_data.content: Been living in Zurich for nearly a year now. This pub is now our regular Weds night meet for fellow Brit workers. Always great atmosphere and great place to watch football. Manager and bar staff really friendly and we can usually get the English games...More

review_data.title: Nice find
review_data.content: Staying at the Sheraton in the industrial district we didn't know where to eat. This was recommended and ws a good find. Reasonable price for Switzerland, excellent large burgers with lots of toppings, good side salad (or fries, but I was pretending to be healthy),...More

review_data.title: Gelangweilte Bedienung in...
review_data.content: ...irgendeinem Pub. Überhaupt nichts Besonderes ! Gute Bierauswahl zu realistischen (Zürcher) Preisen aber sonst auch nix hervorzuheben.

review_data.title: Go for Burgers
review_data.content: We went to this place because it is recommended for Burgers. We weren't disappointed. Service was also good.

review_data.title: Sort of an average place, good for drinks for sure
review_data.content: Just sort of your average English pub/bar in a foreign country. Nothing against it, the drinks are good and service perfunctory. I've been there, and wouldn't hesitate to go again, just to keep things simple.

review_data.title: Nice pub, good burgers, tiny bit pricy
review_data.content: Went there with a bunch of friends. The burgers were really tasty. A bit pricy though but well.. go find a cheap place in zurich. They have some choice in beer but not the largest. Staff is friendly so thats good

review_data.title: Beer and pub food
review_data.content: Modern Irish pub with nice selection of local and international beers. Food is good and the pub has daily specials as a variation to the menu. Music is not too loud, but rock only. Friendly staff makes you feel welcome.

review_data.title: Beers, Burgers...great Pub
